 To apply for admission into the False Bay TVET College FBC Application Form 2024, kindly follow the link and apply online. All applications must be submitted online

What to Know About the False Bay TVET College Application Form Portal

The False Bay TVET College FBC Application portal is designed to accept application of candidates seeking for admission into the University. In the portal, applicant can Purchase application form, Track and monitor application status, pay fees, Print Acknowledgement Slip, check admission list, etc.

Who is Eligible to Apply for Admission

To be eligible for admission in the FBC application portal, candidates must;

  • Have Secondary School Leaving Certificate
  • Meet National Senior Certificate (NSC) requirement for admission into Higher Certificate
  • Grade 12 certificate applicant is of added advantage
  • Must write the NBTs for admission to FBC on/before 15 October 2024.
  • FPS of 480 or above.
  • NBT scores of Upper
  • Intermediate for AL & QL
  • Mathematics 60%
  • English HL 50%
  • English FAL 60%

How to Apply | FBC Application Form 2024

False Bay TVET College Online Application

To apply to False Bay TVET College online, follow these steps:
  1. Visit the college’s official website at www.falsebaycollege.co.za.
  2. Click on the “Apply Now” button located on the homepage.
  3. You will be directed to the online application page, where you can select the program or course you wish to apply for.
  4. Complete the online application form by filling in all the required information and uploading the necessary documents.
  5. Once you have completed the application form, submit it and pay the non-refundable application fee.

Please note that you will need to create an account on the online application portal before you can apply. This will allow you to save your progress and return to your application later if you need to.

 

False Bay TVET College Application Required Documents

To apply to FBC you need to submit the following documentation:

  • A completed application form
  • A copy of your results for the latest school year
  • A copy of your ID
  • If you have attended another higher education institution, we need a copy of your academic transcript

For more information regarding the application for admission into the False Bay TVET College , kindly drop your messages in the comment box below.

FAQ False Bay TVET College Online Application

Here are some frequently asked questions about the online application process at False Bay TVET College:

How do I apply to False Bay TVET College online?

To apply to False Bay TVET College online, visit the college’s official website at www.falsebaycollege.co.za and click on the “Apply Now” button located on the homepage. You will then be directed to the online application page, where you can select the program or course you wish to apply for. Create an account and complete the application form, uploading the required documents and paying the non-refundable application fee.

What documents do I need to Apply Online?

The documents required for online application to False Bay TVET College may vary depending on the program or course you are applying for. However, in general, you will need to provide a certified copy of your ID or passport, your most recent academic qualifications, and any other supporting documents that may be required for your chosen program.

What is the Application Fee for Online Application?

The application fee for online application to False Bay TVET College may vary depending on the program or course you are applying for. However, in general, the application fee is non-refundable and must be paid during the online application process.

How do I Track the Progress of my Online Application?

To track the progress of your online application, you can log in to your online application portal account on the college’s website. You can also contact the admissions office at the college for updates on your application status.

When is the Deadline for Online Application?

The deadline for online application to False Bay TVET College may vary depending on the program or course you are applying for. However, in general, applications are accepted throughout the year, and prospective students are advised to apply as early as possible to avoid disappointment.
